core_tenet.description: Request for feature development or creation

prompts.raw_prompt:
ramp up on this and use /plan to explain how youll execute. I also want to use /cereb in the plan. Do not code yet 
  📍 CONTEXT CHECKPOINT

  ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  📊 Context Status

  - Token Usage: ~95,000 / 200,000 tokens (47.5%)
  - Session Progress: 4/6 major phases completed
  - Context Health: ⚠️ YELLOW - Optimization recommended

  🔑 Key Accomplishments

  ✅ Codex Plus Infrastructure Complete

  - Slash Command Detection: Perfect detection in complex Codex nested format
  - Hook System Integration: 2 pre-hooks + 3 post-hooks executing correctly
  - Middleware Architecture: Complete .claude/ infrastructure integration
  - Streaming Proxy: Maintained without breaking existing functionality

  ✅ Problem Diagnosis Complete

  - Root Cause Identified: Request format mismatch in mutation logic
  - Cloudflare 400 Analysis: Mutation failure causing upstream rejection
  - Regex Issues: False positives on file paths (e.g., /tmp/codex_plus/proxy.log)
  - Event Protocol Research: Complete Codex source code analysis

  ✅ Planning & Documentation

  - 4-Layer TDD Plan: Comprehensive roadmap saved to roadmap/4layer-tdd-plan.md
  - Plan B Implementation: Structured approach from content delivery to execution
  - Debug Artifacts: /tmp/codex_plus/pr-2/mutated_request.json for validation

  📋 Current Issues Requiring Resolution

  🔴 Critical: Mutation Logic Broken

  # Current assumption (WRONG):
  data["input"] = "simple string"

  # Actual Codex format:
  data["input"] = [{"type": "message", "role": "user", "content": [...]}]

  🔴 Critical: Regex False Positives

  Detected: /converge, /tdd, /responses, /tmp/codex_plus/proxy.log, /Users/jleechan/...
  File paths being treated as slash commands.

  🟡 Pending: Branding Display

  - Events generated but not appearing in conversation
  - Structured AgentMessageDelta format implemented but ineffective

  🎯 Remaining Tasks

  Phase 1: Fix Core Logic (URGENT)

  1. Unit Tests: Request format detection and handling
  2. Mutation Fix: Handle complex input structure correctly
  3. Regex Cleanup: Exclude file paths and URLs
  4. Validation: Test with real Codex requests

  Phase 2: End-to-End Validation

  1. Integration Testing: Full pipeline verification
  2. Live Testing: Real Codex CLI validation
  3. Branding Display: Fix event injection timing/format

  Phase 3: Polish & Documentation

  1. Performance Optimization: Stream efficiency
  2. Error Handling: Robust fallback mechanisms
  3. Documentation: Update CLAUDE.md protocols

  💡 Strategic Continuation Recommendations

  ✅ Immediate Next Steps

  1. Implement Layer 1 Unit Tests following the 4-layer plan
  2. Fix apply_codex_mutations() to handle nested input structure
  3. Update regex pattern to exclude file paths
  4. Test with simple /help command end-to-end

  🔧 Context Optimization Strategy

  - Focus on unit tests first - most efficient context usage
  - Use TodoWrite to track progress through 4-layer implementation
  - Validate each layer before proceeding to next
  - Checkpoint again after Phase 1 completion

  🎯 Success Metrics

  - Unit Tests: All pure functions work correctly
  - No 400 Errors: Mutation logic handles both request formats
  - Branding Visible: "🎯 Codex Plus: Detected /help" appears in conversation
  - No Regression: All existing proxy functionality preserved

  🚀 Optimal Break Point

  Recommendation: Continue with Layer 1 unit tests implementation now. Context health is still good for focused
  development work. Checkpoint again after completing Phase 1 (core logic fixes).

  Ready to proceed with: TDD implementation starting with unit tests for request format detection and mutation
  logic fixes.
